text: Velika Remeta () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Irig municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 42 people (2002 census). The Velika Remeta Monastery is located near the village. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina *Velika Remeta Monastery ==References== * Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Velika Remeta
